thread.title: H-E-B releases two Spurs commercial teasers

author: Nick Moyle
title: H-E-B releases two Spurs commercial teasers
text:

Photo: Dan McCarney/San Antonio Express-News Image 14 of 16 Image 15 of 16 A screen-grab of an H-E-B commercial that aired in 2013 with Tony Parker as doorman denying Tim Duncan and Manu Ginobili entry to an exclusive cookout even though he personally invited both.

Photo: Courtesy Photo Image 16 of 16 H-E-B releases two Spurs commercial teasers 1 / 16 Back to Gallery The start of the 2015-2016 NBA season is right around the corner, but that's not the only thing the Spurs are getting fans pumped for.
H-E-B released two video teasers on its website to provide fans of the beloved commercials a tantalizingly brief look at things to come.
One features the newest addition to the cast, LaMarcus Aldridge.
Aldridge stares down at the camera, perplexed, and mutters to himself, "Man, these guys are crazy."
The second has Kawhi Leonard in full-on deadpan mode as he stares at the comically tiny oven mitt that barely fits over four of his fingers.
Well, considering the size of Leonard's actual mitts, this could just be an average mitt with no chance on his "Klaws."
Either way, it looks like the Spurs H-E-B gang is in for more shenanigans this season. Hope LaMarcus can keep up.
To keep up with all the Spurs teasers and commercials, check out www.heb.com/spurs .
